name: Meteor's Dodge
description:
Synopsis

You are a pilot named “Meteor”, trying to survive from the attack of another bigger ship.

Between that, both of you are in an asteroid field, making it difficult for you to survive from the shots.

In an inevitable death, how long can he survive?

Install instructions

1) Download to your pc

2) Transfer the apk to mobile

3) Open the apk from the mobile with an application that allows it

4) Enjoy :D
